amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the labeling of genetically engineered fish.

vote.text: Amendment SA 341 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 341 proposed by Senator Begich. (consideration: CR S2279; text: CR S2279) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the labeling of genetically engineered fish.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 341 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 341 proposed by Senator Begich.
